product.title: Woodland Twilight - Roller Blind
product.description: When you take a closer look at woodland twilight you soon come to appreciate that it has far more to offer than one of this season's must-have colours. Everything about the subtlety of the texture has been designed to add depth and clarity to your decor like never before. The best way to match to twilight is to focus on texture before you think about colour. Rubbing down your wooden floor and lightly staining it will add more character than laying laminate flooring.
